hints.content:
Ming had $59$ cupcakes and he gave $30$ cupcakes to his classmates at school.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/21549611faf2a4d0ba22247b1ed2444a6aacb326)

$\purpleD{59}-\blueE{30}=\maroonD{29}$

Ming had $\maroonD{29}$ cupcakes left after giving some to his classmates.

question.content:
Ming had $59$ birthday cupcakes.  He gave $30$ cupcakes to his classmates at school.  Ming's family ate another $11$ cupcakes at home.   

**How many cupcakes does Ming have left?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] cupcakes
